definition: backwards and forwards action (e.g. of piston or pump)/reciprocating motion
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: To produce the pumping action, it contains pistons that are driven back and forth, or rotating vanes.
sentences.chinese: 要生產泵動作用，它包括往復運動的活塞或旋轉葉片。

sentences.english: Obstruction or vibration in the movement of roving traverse.
sentences.chinese: 粗紗導紗器的往復運動不靈活或振動。

sentences.english: Shaking screen on crank-connecting rod for reciprocating motion to the sieve case.
sentences.chinese: 搖動篩依靠曲柄連桿機構使篩箱作往復運動。

sentences.english: The piston is reciprocating inside cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 活塞在汽缸內部往復運動。

sentences.english: The most common applications of DSH Spring Energized Seals are reciprocating radial motion.
sentences.chinese: 彈簧增強密封最常用的用途是用於往復運動密封。

sentences.english: The reciprocating motion of differential cylinder servo system is asymmetrical.
sentences.chinese: 差動缸液壓伺服系統往復運動是非對稱的。

sentences.english: The experimental results proved that this stage can run stably to-and-fro.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明，該平臺能夠實現平穩往復運動。
